name: 2D World of Tanks - MGJ
description:
The aim of this project is to recreate of the armour mechanic of the game "World of Tanks", which is 3D, in 2D and simplified.

Tanks have thicker armour on the front, less on the sides, and least on the rear. Player must try to face the front armour of its tank towards the enemies to deflect shots.

Armour angling is also recreated. Angling the armour increases relative armour, which means more protection.

Controls:

- A and D to rotate

- W and S to move

- ESC to open menu

Created by Lei Ye
